Read in NZ census data

read_census_data.Rd

This function is a helper to read in the census data. Mainly meant for easy transformations such as whether to include the GIS data, what its CRS system should be (defaults to 2198) and whether it should come in the wide (default) or long format.

read_census_data(data_set, include_gis = TRUE, long = FALSE, crs = 2198,
  sp = FALSE, replace_confidential_values = NULL)

Arguments

data_set

The data set to be passed. See what_data_sets.
include_gis

If the data set should include the gis column (defaults to TRUE).
long

If the data set should be in long or short form (defaults to wide).
crs

The desired Coordinate Reference System of the data set (defaults to 2198). Only
sp

Convert the simple features data frame to a sp object.
replace_confidential_values

Replacement of confidential values ("..C") with another value e.g. NA or 0 or anything for that matter! important if the data includes a geometry column.

Value

It returns either a tibble or a simple features dataframe.

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
